title: ActionPlan
description: Defines executable actions to be taken based on policy evaluation. Verbs are FROZEN as of M1.5 to prevent contract drift between teams.

schema_version.description: Schema version for this ActionPlan (frozen at v1)

plan_id.description: Unique identifier for this action plan (format: plan://org/repo/slug)

policy_id.description: Policy that triggered this plan. MUST be versioned (id@YYYY.MM.DD), NEVER a channel.

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when this plan was created

actions.description: Ordered list of actions to execute

verb.description: FROZEN verb list (flat naming). Adding new verbs requires major version bump and cross-team coordination.

metadata.description: Optional metadata for tracking and debugging

triggered_by.description: Event or actor that triggered this plan

context.description: Additional context (PR number, commit SHA, etc.)
